channel.title: Problem on Serm's blog

item.title: Code as request 2
item.description: Code as request 2 Every lunch time, my team will struggle finding place to have lunch. Everyone will ask each other “Where will we have lunch today?”, and most of us would say “anywhere”. We waste time here up to minutes a day. We have tried 3 approaches. Line vote In Line application, there is a feature to create poll and let everyone in group vote the result. Sound great.
